description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=0/3. Let's collect items by excavating a planet or exterminating a space monster.  It can also ride on a shuttle. If items are collected, a Akashic record will be completed and a battle of the last will start. Let's supply food, if physical strength decreases.
